game_description: Shooting Therapy is a unique zero-g shooting simulation with accurate physics interactions and collisions. Relax on your sofa and transform your living room into a space station with a beautiful low earth orbit view. Pick your pistol and practise your shooting skills on the randomly flying biscuits or the countless spent bullets and casings hovering around. Roomscale tracking allows the game to be enjoyed either seated or standing. Use your superpower to slow time at will and use your environment to ricochet your bullets in any way you can imagine ..or pick your katana sword and slash your targets at close range. Features: * Accurate physical interactions and collisions * Haptic feedback * 250 concurrent hovering bullets and casings * Bullet Time (slow time effect) * Realtime lighting Planned features * Multiplayer mode
review_1: Could do with a way to draw the gun back to your hand if it gets too far away. Would be also cool if you could float yourself around as well.
